text: Harriet Andersson (born 14 February 1932) is a Swedish actress. She is best known for appearing in many movies directed by Ingmar Bergman and eventually being his romantic partner. Andersson appeared in several of his best-known movies, including Smiles of a Summer Night (1955), Through a Glass Darkly (1961), Cries and Whispers (1972), and Fanny and Alexander (1982). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish voice actors Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Harriet Andersson
